parameters.query: SELECT id, sl_no AS "Sl No.", client_id AS "Client ID", client_name AS "Client Name", dr_name AS "Dr Name", gmb_profile_id AS "GMB Profile ID", website_url AS "Website URL", client_reporting_sheet AS "Client Reporting Sheet", whatsapp AS "WhatsApp", city_name AS "City Name", country AS "Country" FROM dr_smart.clients ORDER BY id;

SELECT id, sl_no AS "Sl No.", client_id AS "Client ID", client_name AS "Client Name", gmb_profile_id AS "GMB Profile ID", website_url AS "Website URL", client_reporting_sheet AS "Client Reporting Sheet", whatsapp AS "WhatsApp" FROM dr_smart.clients WHERE sl_no = {{ $json['Sl No.'] }};

INSERT INTO dr_smart.client_reports (client_id, profile_name, unique_profile_name, start_date, end_date, search_views, interactions, website_clicks, direction_requests, phone_calls, website_speed, seo_score) VALUES ((SELECT id FROM dr_smart.clients WHERE client_name = '{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Client Name'] }}' LIMIT 1), '{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Client Name'] }}', '{{ $('Edit Fields').item.json['Client Name'] }}{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartDay }}/{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartMonth }}/{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartYear }}', '{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartYear }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartMonth }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.StartDay }}'::date, '{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndYear }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndMonth }}-{{ $('Start and End Date').first().json.EndDay }}'::date, {{ $json.data[3].BUSINESS_IMPRESSIONS_MOBILE_SEARCH_total + $json.data[2].BUSINESS_IMPRESSIONS_DESKTOP_SEARCH_total + $json.data[5].BUSINESS_IMPRESSIONS_MOBILE_MAPS_total + $json.data[4].BUSINESS_IMPRESSIONS_DESKTOP_MAPS_total }}, {{ $json.data[0].WEBSITE_CLICKS_total + $json.data[6].BUSINESS_DIRECTION_REQUESTS_total + $json.data[1].CALL_CLICKS_total }}, {{ $json.data[0].WEBSITE_CLICKS_total }}, {{ $json.data[6].BUSINESS_DIRECTION_REQUESTS_total }}, {{ $json.data[1].CALL_CLICKS_total }}, '{{ $json.data[7].audits["first-contentful-paint"].displayValue }}', {{ $json.data[7].scores.seo }}) ON CONFLICT (unique_profile_name) DO UPDATE SET search_views = EXCLUDED.search_views, interactions = EXCLUDED.interactions, website_clicks = EXCLUDED.website_clicks, direction_requests = EXCLUDED.direction_requests, phone_calls = EXCLUDED.phone_calls, website_speed = EXCLUDED.website_speed, seo_score = EXCLUDED.seo_score;
